name: Rikaikun
tagline: Rikaikun fork that supports English, German (Wadoku) ...
body:
rikaikun
========

![Visuals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/s-fiebig/rikaikun/gh-pages/images/rikaikun_popup.png "Rikaikun popup")

This is a Rikaikun fork (https://code.google.com/p/rikaikun/) that supports additional languages besides English.

#### Installation

1. Grab the newest release under: https://github.com/s-fiebig/rikaikun/releases
2. Open the extension in Chrome using developer mode.

####Supported Languages

* English: Default language.

* German: From the German Wadoku project. 

* ...

####Licenses

The project stands under GPLv2. The German language file is under a special double license (http://www.wadoku.de/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=357).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
